In 1998, he was named among the list of Football League 100 Legends, and was made an Inaugural Inductee of the English Football Hall of Fame in 2002 in recognition of his impact on the English game as a player. He was named as one of West Bromwich Albion's 16 greatest players, in a 2004 poll organised as part of the club's 125th anniversary celebrations. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:English football managers Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from County Durham Category:Premier League players Category:Association football coaches Category:Officers of the Order of the British Empire Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players Category:1982 FIFA World Cup players Category:1986 FIFA World Cup players Category:1990 FIFA World Cup players
